title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at NECCO (Elkins, WV) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Over the phone interview which leads to a virtual interview.  Very nice employee with tons of great information. The 1st interview covered any questions that I had and I also learned so much about the company and position.
Interview Questions: What draws me to work in the field of foster care.

title: Case Manager Interview
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process was speedy and effective. Their team interview method shows that they care about the teams opinion and want to be sure all parties work together well. 
The time frame I received a response back about the position was also incredibly fast. Less than a week between applying and wrapping up the interview process.
Interview Questions: How would you deescalate a high stress time with the client?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at NECCO (Martinez, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed by the staff as a team. The question provoked much thought and requires one to pause before answering. It is important to explore Necco's website before the interview. Familiarize yourself with Hobbs Principles. Be prepared to have a rotation being on call.
Interview Questions: Describe what you think the case manager's job looks like as it applies to daily responsibilities?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at NECCO (South Point, OH) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: I am currently going through the process. I am meeting with the team today for an interview and will update about next steps. So far the hiring process appears to be simple and I will be meeting with a group of 5 people to determine what next steps will be taken to proceed if I take the job.

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at NECCO
Interview Descriptions: It's a two part interview. Part of it is a cultural and the other is a job specific. You will need to read about the culture and do your research about the company to show you're invested.
Interview Questions: What does We Build families mean to you?

title: Supervised Visitation Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at NECCO (Huntington, WV)
Interview Descriptions: I applied in December of 2018. They called Feburary 2019, I interviewed 3 days later. There were 3-4 people in the room. They all asked questions. I left, and they called a few hours later with the job offer.
Interview Questions: What do you know about Necco?

title: Girl Scouts Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at NECCO
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview followed by an in person interview with the head of the program planning. Overall there were some very nice individuals  with a lot of passion for and  about the community and the girl scouts program.

title: HCR Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at NECCO (Atlanta, GA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Efficient but friendly. I felt very comfortable  in talking and meeting with the staff.  They were clear about what they were looking for and what the job would entail.

title: Case Manager - Foster Care Interview
Application Type: The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at NECCO (Cross Lanes, WV)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed by 4 people around a table.  Was told I was not an exact fit for particular job but gave me information about a job they wanted me to apply for.  Applied to that job, never received even a phone call

title: Case Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at NECCO (Logan, WV) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: The first interview was one-on-one with the program director.   And the second interview was a group interview with multiple staff members and multiple candidates for the job all together.
Interview Questions: Why I would be a better fit for the job than the other candidates.

title: Residential Skill Builder Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at NECCO (Pedro, OH) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by four people at once. A little stressing. Had to make a video about why I wanted to work there. Had to answer a questionairre on the computer following my interview about what I'd do in certain situations. Got sent out for a drug screen and physical the same day.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work around kids with disabilities?

title: Life Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at NECCO (Jonesboro, GA) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with managers and employees. At least five or more people. The team is laid back bit some ask more demanding questions. You have to be relaxed with alot of people.
Interview Questions:
Are you a winner and why?
Tell me about something that you did was outside of the box.
How do you handle pressure.
